__TOC__

Board tested under Gutsy, and Hardy, it works perfectly.

After installing one of the above versions the only requirement was to install the Nvidia glx, or glx new drivers using synaptic.  

Upon further testing all hardware used, and included on the board were detected, sound quality was great, as well.
---------------------------
Hardware used:
Intel Pentium E2140 Allendale 

GeForce 7900 GTX

Liteon DVDRW LH-20A1L

80GB sata

2GB ddr2 800
